org.finra.herd.app

Class WarInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.finra.herd.app.WarInitializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer

    public class WarInitializer
extends Object
implements org.springframework.web.WebApplicationInitializer
    The WAR initializer. This replaces the majority of the web.xml configuration so things can be done programmatically for compile time syntax checking and Java debugging capabilities.

      Initializes the context loader listener which bootstraps Spring and provides access to the application context.

      Initializes the delegating filter proxy which is used for Spring Security.
      protected void initDispatchServlet(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Initializes the dispatch servlet which is used for Spring MVC REST and UI controllers.
      protected void initLog4JMdcLoggingFilter(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Initializes the Log4J MDC logging filter which provides extra diagnostic information that can be used for logging.
      protected void initRequestLoggingFilter(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Initializes the request logging filter that logs all incoming REST requests.
      protected void initServletMapping(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      Initializes the servlet mapping that allows the application server to serve up various static content.
